analysis.description:
LOCIsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#570-648) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- startingTokensAmount == 0

Reentrancy in LOCIcoin.claimRefund (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#377-403):
	External calls:
	- _refundHandler.handleRefundRequest(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#389-390)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#403)

Reentrancy in LOCIsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#570-648):
	External calls:
	- _tokensRemaining = token.balanceOf(address(this)).sub(reservedTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#585-586)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#616-618)

Reentrancy in LOCIsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#570-648):
	External calls:
	- _tokensRemaining = token.balanceOf(address(this)).sub(reservedTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#585-586)
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,_tokens)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#619-622)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- discountTranches (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#629-631)
	- discountTranches (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#631-635)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#622-623)

LOCIsale.ownerRecoverTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#715-725) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokensRemaining) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#723-725)

Reentrancy in LOCIsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#570-648):
	External calls:
	- _tokensRemaining = token.balanceOf(address(this)).sub(reservedTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#585-586)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentDiscountTrancheIndex (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#603-606)
	- startingTokensAmount (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#590)

Reentrancy in LOCIsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#570-648):
	External calls:
	- _tokensRemaining = token.balanceOf(address(this)).sub(reservedTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#585-586)
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,_tokens)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#619-622)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaisedAfterDiscounts (/unique_chucks/3/0x5401bb4729bd7f025b97399c3c92854ec299f81a.sol#640-641)
